QuestData.Title: Golden Fields Forever
QuestData.Description: I can take care of the rest. That ettin would have given me trouble if I was by myself, so you have my thanks.$b$bI would ask you for one more favor.$b$bMy wife, she loved the carnations that grow by the water's edge. If you could gather some, there's a nice spot under a tree by the river. We loved to go there when the sun set after our days in the fields.$b$bOur boy would run around, catching bugs, making reed whistles...
QuestData.LogDescription: Lay Farmer Goldfield's family to rest.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $c. They will rest now.
